name: Polygon Defense
description:
THESE  POLYGONS  NEED  SOME  SLAYIN'

  • 5 increasingly difficult and uniquely designed levels that will force you to change your strategy!
  • 5 different towers to choose from, each with access to various upgrades that add variance to every playthrough!
  • Extra game mode that turns each level into a sandbox endurance round!
  • Competitive global high score table! (v2 of high score table coming soon)
  • A handful of cool jams to vibe out to while you slay polygons!

I'm open to all feedback and take the community's desires into consideration! 

:)
